title: Detection of SARS-CoV-2 N protein using AgNPs-modified aligned silicon nanowires BioSERS chip
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,12071-12080
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00267A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sadok Kouz, Amal Raouafi, Awatef Ouhibi, Nathalie Lorrain, Makram Essafi, Manel Mejri, Noureddine Raouafi, Adel Moadhen, Mohammed Guendouz
A sensitive and selective bioSERS chip was developed for the detection of nucleocapsid protein from SARS-CoV-2 virus, applied to sense the N protein in human blood serum.
